comments.author: Dave
comments.body: I think the Gunthenator oughta' re-design the Flagstaff House's website... then take us _all_ up there for _Coquilles Saint Jacques_. DU

comments.author: Rob
comments.body: just what the doctor ordered! See you there...

comments.author: Dave
comments.body: Happy Birthday, Adriana!!!! Make what-'is-name take you someplace fancy tonight! DU

comments.author: Werner
comments.body: I like Dave's idea. I think Steve should take you to the [Flaggstaff House](http://www.flagstaffhouse.com/), of course!
